definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Environmental capacity is a natural science nomenclature to describe the pollution capacity that accommodated by the environmental stuffs.
sentences.chinese: 环境容量是描述环境要素纳污能力的自然科学表述。

sentences.english: This attains to the narrative core of the dream.
sentences.chinese: 这一点触及了梦的表述核心。

sentences.english: “I believe I laid it on ’em pretty straight, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说“我相信我已经对他们表述得很清楚了。”

sentences.english: Hence, we give a new expression of Slaving Principle and study its relation to Adiabatic Approximation.
sentences.chinese: 为此给出了役使原理的新表述，并探讨两者的关系。

sentences.english: For example, the medical community uses RDF to describe genomic databases.
sentences.chinese: 例如，医学组织使用RDF来表述染色体组数据库。

sentences.english: These nouns refer to the feeling or expression of deep-seated ill will.
sentences.chinese: 这些名词指根深蒂固的恶意的感情或表述。

sentences.english: The Gospel is clear on that, too. Woe to you on whom the evil demons act.
sentences.chinese: 福音书上很清楚，对那些被魔鬼附身的表述悲哀吧。

sentences.english: Many of these duties will be indescribably difficult.
sentences.chinese: 许多这些事情困难地难以表述。

sentences.english: Thus it is the distinctive mark of quantity that it can be called equal and unequal.
sentences.chinese: 所以可以被等于和不等于表述是数量的显著标志。

sentences.english: I'm afraid i gona love you.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有一个表述成了我害怕你爱上我。

sentences.english: Paso doble is also introduced, the two expressions will be quite different.
sentences.chinese: 同样是介绍斗牛舞，两人的表述方式就大不一样。

sentences.english: And surveys of NDE accounts show great similarities in the details.
sentences.chinese: NDE表述的调查显示了详细资料的相似性。

sentences.english: Text is good at expressing what is done in a single step of in a business process.
sentences.chinese: 文本长于表述在业务流程的单个步骤中完成的工作。

sentences.english: The form of the former formula is formally formulated.
sentences.chinese: 前一个分子式的形式得到正式表述。

sentences.english: In computer terms, this rule is also known as recursive tree descent.
sentences.chinese: 以计算机术语表述，这条规则也可以称作递归树下行。

sentences.english: Hierarchies are the logical structures that an organization creates to describe relationships among its data.
sentences.chinese: 层次结构是组织创建用于表述其数据关系的逻辑结构。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
